ygData.subject: Re: Battle bard vs singing bard (was Does CHR affect Largos?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d agree with that for blues or lower. Against reds, I feel charisma does help.  The sample size is small (not often that my group fights multiple reds)
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 9 Feb 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> Charisma isn't that important. Not as important as you play it out
> to be. I have 130 CHA and I rarely get resisted on songs versus
> blues or lower. Anything over 100 seems to be all the same to me.

I'd agree with that for blues or lower.

Against reds, I feel charisma does help. The sample size is
small (not often that my group fights multiple reds) so I
can't say for sure. But I've had many cases where a red mob
seemed easier to Pixie Strike after I got a charisma buff, and
no cases where a red mob seemed harder to PS after I got a
charisma buff.

> I missed four notes in a row a night ago on Clarit. Still doesn't
> top my record of five missed on Selo's. Whenever I miss notes,
> it's almost always consecutive. Poor, poor random function.

You noticed this too? I'm guessing that half the time I miss
a note, I'll immediately miss another note.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
